Row.Text: Cocoa Beverage
A new, sweet beverage made from local cocoa beans is circulating amongst the city's elite.
We will introduce this drink to the Palace.
{1_Num} and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on the [ICON_RES_COCOA] Cocoa worked by this city.
The Cocoa beverage at {2_CityDesc} will be brought to the Palace.
We should invest in this drink for popular consumption.
{1_Num} and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the [ICON_RES_COCOA] Cocoa worked by this city.
The Cocoa beverage at {2_CityDesc} will be invested in.
Crab Over-fishing
Local crab numbers have begun to dwindle, and fishermen are concerned that they will soon disappear.
That makes them all the more valueable.
-1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the [ICON_RES_CRAB] Crab worked by this city.
The Crab at {2_CityDesc} will continue to be over-fished.
Crab fishing needs to be regulated.
-1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates, and +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and -1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the [ICON_RES_CRAB] Crab worked by this city for {5_Num} turns.
The Crab at {2_CityDesc} will be regulated to allow their numbers to replenish.
Damage to Belem Tower
Disaster! An earthquake has struck the city and damaged the Belem Tower. Its repair will not come cheap.
Indeed. It is a national treasure.
We have paid to repair Belem Tower after it was damanged in an earthquake.
An earthquake in the {5_CivAdj} city of {2_CityDesc} has damaged the Belem Tower.
Let's take the time to refurbish it.
{1_Num} and Belem Tower yields +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
We have paid to refurbish Belem Tower after it was damanged in an earthquake.
An earthquake in the {5_CivAdj} city of {2_CityDesc} has damaged the Belem Tower.
We will not pay.
Belem Tower yields -1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
We have refused to pay to repair Belem Tower after it was damanged in an earthquake.
An earthquake in the {5_CivAdj} city of {2_CityDesc} has damaged the Belem Tower.
Feather Brews
Local herbalists have begun brewing a new medicine from the city's access to rare Feathers.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_JFD_HEALTH] Health on the [ICON_RES_JFD_FEATHERS] Feathers worked by this city.
The Feathers at {2_CityDesc} are being used in medicinal brews.
Gem Engravements
Local scientists have appealed for funding to develop Gem tools to be used in fine engravement and cutting.
We will give them the funding.
{1_Num}, -1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, and +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science on the [ICON_RES_GEMS] Gems worked by this city.
The Gems at {2_CityDesc} will be put to scientific use.
Absolutely not. These Gems are too valueable.
No effect.
The Gems at {2_CityDesc} will remain to be used for commercial use.
Imitation Marble
Local craftsmen are world-renown for their marble sculptures, however, imitation marble has begun to displace their work.
Their works must be protected against imitation.
-1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on the [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble worked by this city.
The authentic Marble at {2_CityDesc} will be protected.
We should invest more in this imitation marble.
{1_Num} and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the [ICON_RES_MARBLE] Marble worked by this city.
The imitation Marble at {2_CityDesc} will be invested in.
Ivory Boycotts
Buyers have begun to boycott local Ivory-based products, citing the cruel method of obtaining them from animals.
This ivory will need to be regulated then.
-1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates, and -1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on the [ICON_RES_IVORY] Ivory worked by this city.
The Ivory at {2_CityDesc} will be regulated over concerns about animal cruelty.
We will merely find other buyers then.
No effect.
The Ivory at {2_CityDesc} will continue to be harvested cruelly. Dick.
Obsidian Blades
Local smiths have begun to use Obsidian in forging weapons. This has caused some unease amongst the priesthood.
An innovative idea!
+2 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great General Points on the [ICON_RES_JFD_OBSIDIAN] Obsidian worked by this city.
The Obsidian at {2_CityDesc} is being forged into weapons.
Obsidian is sacred, and this must be outlawed.
+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith on the [ICON_RES_JFD_OBSIDIAN] Obsidian worked by this city.
The Obsidian at {2_CityDesc} has been protected from smithing.
Prized Oak
The local Oaks have gained a reputation for being of particularly sturdy stock. It might be worthwhile investing in them.
Then we should use this Oak in our navy.
{1_Num} and +2 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Admiral Point on the [ICON_RES_JFD_OAK] Oak worked by this city.
The Oak at {2_CityDesc} is to be put to use in shipbuilding.
The Oak could be better used on our Buildings.
{1_Num} and +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on the [ICON_RES_JFD_OAK] Oak worked by this city.
The Oak at {2_CityDesc} is to be put to use in infrastructure.
Leave it be.
No effect.
Rose Pearls
Local mollusks have been producing unique, rose-tinted pearls. These pearls are held to be of considereable value.
They shall be a boon for our economy.
+4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the [ICON_RES_PEARLS] Pearls worked by this city for {5_Num} turns.
The rose-tinted Pearls at {2_CityDesc} will continue to be sold.
These pearls should become apart of our regalia.
+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on the [ICON_RES_PEARLS] Pearls worked by this city.
The Pearls at {2_CityDesc} are to become a part of our regalia.
Rubber Exploitation
Labourers in the city working at the local Rubber source are reportedly being exploited and abused by their managers. The conditions are deplorable.
This needs to end.
+{4_Num} [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] WLTKD Sentiment and -1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the [ICON_RES_JFD_RUBBER] Rubber worked by this city.
Exploitation of Rubber labourers at {2_CityDesc} will cease.
They need to work harder.
+{3_Num} [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt Sentiment and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the [ICON_RES_JFD_RUBBER] Rubber worked by this city.
Exploitation of Rubber labourers at {2_CityDesc} will only worsen.
It's none of our business.
No effect.
Exploitation of Rubber labourers at {2_CityDesc} will continue.
Sacred Cedar

The local Cedar wood has been hailed by a Prophet as a sacred symbol, and has taken on religious significance for the people.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith on the [ICON_RES_JFD_CEDAR] Cedar worked by this city.
The Cedar at {2_CityDesc} has become a religious symbol.
Saffron Dyes
A Saffron-based dye has become widely available and has circulated amongst the common people.
The saffron should be reserved for the elite.
+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on the [ICON_RES_JFD_SAFFRON] Saffron worked by this city.
The Saffron at {2_CityDesc} is to be reserved for the elite.
The saffron should be reserved for the monks.
+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith on the [ICON_RES_JFD_SAFFRON] Saffron worked by this city.
The Saffron at {2_CityDesc} is to be reserved for the local monastery.
The saffron should be taxed accordingly.
+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the [ICON_RES_JFD_SAFFRON] Saffron worked by this city.
The Saffron at {2_CityDesc} is to be taxed.
Salt March
Protests have broken out over local taxes on Salt, and a march has set out to extract its own salt from the sea in opposition.
This must be put to an end.
+{3_Num} [ICON_JFD_REVOLT] Revolt Sentiment.
The Salt at {2_CityDesc} will remain taxed despite protests.
Salt taxes will be temporarily suspended.
+{4_Num} [ICON_JFD_WLTKD] WLTKD Sentiment and -1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the [ICON_RES_SALT] Salt worked by this city for {5_Num} turns.
The Salt at {2_CityDesc} will be exempted from tax in response to protests.
Sugar Excess
Local researchers have linked increasing sugar consumption to poor health, and are calling for city-wide regulations.
Indeed. It should be controlled.
-1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the [ICON_RES_SUGAR] Sugar worked by this city.
The Sugar at {2_CityDesc} is to be regulated in response to health concerns.
We will not regulate sugar.
+1 [ICON_JFD_DISEASE] Disease on the [ICON_RES_SUGAR] Sugar worked by this city.
The Sugar at {2_CityDesc} will remain unregulated despite health concerns.
Sulphur Thieves
Alchemists have been stealing samples from the local source of Sulphur for their research, disrupting our extraction of it.
They must be stopped!
No effect.
The Sulphur at {2_CityDesc} has been safeguarded against thieving alchemists.
Their research should be encouraged.
+1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science and -1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on the [ICON_RES_JFD_SULFUR] Sulphur worked by this city.
The Sulphur at {2_CityDesc} is to be studied by local alchemists.
Sweeter Citrus
Cultivators have discovered a breed of citrus fruits that are sweeter than normal, enhancing their palatibility.
These fruits will be worth much.
+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the [ICON_RES_CITRUS] Citrus worked by this city.
The Citrus at {2_CityDesc} will continue to be sold.
These fruits should be protected.
+1 [ICON_FOOD] Food on the [ICON_RES_CITRUS] Citrus worked by this city.
The Citrus at {2_CityDesc} will be protected for local consumption.
These fruits should for reserved for only the Palace.
{1_Num} and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on the [ICON_RES_CITRUS] Citrus worked by this city.
The Citrus at {2_CityDesc} will be reserved for the Palace.
Toxic Dyes
City festivals are well known to use local dyes, but excess use has been discovered to be toxic.
We will need to regulate its use then.
-1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates.
The Dyes at {2_CityDesc} will be regulated due to their toxicity.
It's not a matter of our concern.
+1 [ICON_JFD_DISEASE] Disease on the [ICON_RES_DYE] Dyes worked by this city.
The Dyes at {2_CityDesc} will be ignored despite their toxicity.
Truffle Remedies
Locals have taken to using truffles in medicine over their traditional culinary use.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_JFD_HEALTH] Health on the [ICON_RES_TRUFFLES] Truffles worked by this city.
The Truffles at {2_CityDesc} are being used in medicine instead of cooking.
Vanilla Price Spikes
A foreign disaster has caused local sources of Vanilla to become more valueable.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on the [ICON_RES_JFD_VANILLA] Vanilla worked by this city.
The Vanilla at {2_CityDesc} has become more valueable.
Whale Watchers
A pod of Whales is becoming a popular attraction to locals. There is an opportunity here for further investment.
We can commercialise this!
{1_Num} and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold on [ICON_RES_WHALE] Whales worked by this city.
The Whales at {2_CityDesc} are to become subject to commercial whale watching.
These Whales should be studied closely.
{1_Num} and +1 [ICON_RESEARCH] Science on [ICON_RES_WHALE] Whales worked by this city.
The Whales at {2_CityDesc} are to become subject to academic research.
These Whales must be protected.
{1_Num} and +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture on [ICON_RES_WHALE] Whales worked by this city.
The Whales at {2_CityDesc} are to become subject to greater conservation.
There is no reason to intervene.
+1 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism on [ICON_RES_WHALE] Whales worked by this city.
The Whales at {2_CityDesc} are to be left as a tourist attraction.
Wheat Blight
Local Wheat crops have been left devastated by a crippling Blight.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]-1 [ICON_FOOD] Food on the [ICON_RES_WHEAT] Wheat worked by this city for {5_Num} turns.
The Wheat at {2_CityDesc} have been devasted by a blight.
A blight in the {5_CivAdj} city of {2_CityDesc} has devasted local Wheat crops.
Venturer's Service
A wayward but experienced adventurer has petitioned us to fund a voyage to chart the unknown. He promises any investment will see an abundant return.
Throw money at him until he finds us new lands!
{1_Num} and a {2_UnitDesc} that earns [ICON_GOLD] Gold from revealing tiles appears.
We have agreed to fund a vagabond Venturer in his quest for adventure.
We will not pay this vagabond.
No effect.
We have turned away a vagabond Venturer in his quest for adventure.
Venturer
Earns [ICON_GOLD] Gold from revealing tiles.
